Html:
Hello, I am having problems with a cell which converts a string like this 23123734823493478 (is an bank account) to a number like this 7,85025E+19

How can I apply a style to this cell?

Thanks

An integer value that large will always be converted to a float (and displayed in scientific format by MS Excel) unless you explicitly set it to be a string using:
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()
    ->setCellValueExplicit('A8', "23123734823493478", PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_STRING);
Ok, thanks for your help!! I am grateful with you!!
